00058 ultimix.GetRandomInt = function( Min , Max )
00059 {
00060       if( !Min )Min = 0;
00061       if( !Max )Max = 1000000000;
00062       
00063       return( Math.floor( Math.random() * ( Max - Min + 1 ) ) + Min );
00064 }

00081       var RotateLeft = function(lValue, iShiftBits) {
00082                   return (lValue<<iShiftBits) | (lValue>>>(32-iShiftBits));
00083             };
00084 
00085       var AddUnsigned = function(lX,lY) {
00086                   var lX4,lY4,lX8,lY8,lResult;
00087                   lX8 = (lX & 0x80000000);
00088                   lY8 = (lY & 0x80000000);
00089                   lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
00090                   lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
00091                   lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF)+(lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);
00092                   if (lX4 & lY4) {
00093                         return (lResult ^ 0x80000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
00094                   }
00095                   if (lX4 | lY4) {
00096                         if (lResult & 0x40000000) {
00097                               return (lResult ^ 0xC0000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
00098                         } else {
00099                               return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
00100                         }
00101                   } else {
00102                         return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
00103                   }
00104             };

00106       var F = function(x,y,z) { return (x & y) | ((~x) & z); };
00107       var G = function(x,y,z) { return (x & z) | (y & (~z)); };
00108       var H = function(x,y,z) { return (x ^ y ^ z); };
00109       var I = function(x,y,z) { return (y ^ (x | (~z))); };
00110 
00111       var FF = function(a,b,c,d,x,s,ac) {
00112                   a = AddUnsigned(a, AddUnsigned(AddUnsigned(F(b, c, d), x), ac));
00113                   return AddUnsigned(RotateLeft(a, s), b);
00114             };
00115 
00116       var GG = function(a,b,c,d,x,s,ac) {
00117                   a = AddUnsigned(a, AddUnsigned(AddUnsigned(G(b, c, d), x), ac));
00118                   return AddUnsigned(RotateLeft(a, s), b);
00119             };
00120 
00121       var HH = function(a,b,c,d,x,s,ac) {
00122                   a = AddUnsigned(a, AddUnsigned(AddUnsigned(H(b, c, d), x), ac));
00123                   return AddUnsigned(RotateLeft(a, s), b);
00124             };
00125 
00126       var II = function(a,b,c,d,x,s,ac) {
00127                   a = AddUnsigned(a, AddUnsigned(AddUnsigned(I(b, c, d), x), ac));
00128                   return AddUnsigned(RotateLeft(a, s), b);
00129             };

00131       var ConvertToWordArray = function(str) {
00132                   var lWordCount;
00133                   var lMessageLength = str.length;
00134                   var lNumberOfWords_temp1=lMessageLength + 8;
00135                   var lNumberOfWords_temp2=(lNumberOfWords_temp1-(lNumberOfWords_temp1 % 64))/64;
00136                   var lNumberOfWords = (lNumberOfWords_temp2+1)*16;
00137                   var lWordArray=Array(lNumberOfWords-1);
00138                   var lBytePosition = 0;
00139                   var lByteCount = 0;
00140                   while ( lByteCount < lMessageLength ) {
00141                         lWordCount = (lByteCount-(lByteCount % 4))/4;
00142                         lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4)*8;
00143                         lWordArray[lWordCount] = (lWordArray[lWordCount] | (str.charCodeAt(lByteCount)<<lBytePosition));
00144                         lByteCount++;
00145                   }
00146                   lWordCount = (lByteCount-(lByteCount % 4))/4;
00147                   lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4)*8;
00148                   lWordArray[lWordCount] = lWordArray[lWordCount] | (0x80<<lBytePosition);
00149                   lWordArray[lNumberOfWords-2] = lMessageLength<<3;
00150                   lWordArray[lNumberOfWords-1] = lMessageLength>>>29;
00151                   return lWordArray;
00152             };

00154       var WordToHex = function(lValue) {
00155                   var WordToHexValue="",WordToHexValue_temp="",lByte,lCount;
00156                   for (lCount = 0;lCount<=3;lCount++) {
00157                         lByte = (lValue>>>(lCount*8)) & 255;
00158                         WordToHexValue_temp = "0" + lByte.toString(16);
00159                         WordToHexValue = WordToHexValue + WordToHexValue_temp.substr(WordToHexValue_temp.length-2,2);
00160                   }
00161                   return WordToHexValue;
00162             };
